description:
When Chihiro sprains his ankle and can`t do the housework, he worries about leaving it to Madoka. A few days later, Hino brings over a scary movie…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Man Never Goes Back on His Word
Danshi no Hitokoto, Kintetsu no Gotoshi
La parole d`un homme est d`or
男子の一言, 金鉄の如し
